channel.title: Autobiographies on LonerHermitNEET
channel.description: Recent content in Autobiographies on LonerHermitNEET

item.description: I started writing the autobiography around July 5, 2023. A person’s name is like a summary, but in reality, each person has many different aspects to their identity. When someone writes an introduction about a person, they struggle with how to represent the person’s complexity from both the past and present. Most existing introductions provide a general overview of different parts of the person’s life and try to treat all aspects equally.
